title: Patriots Stock Watch: Who stood out and struggled in comeback win against Ravens

bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots pulled off a big win in Baltimore.

title: Report: Red Sox trade for Cardinals first baseman Willson Contreras
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Red Sox Contreras has hit at least 20 home runs in six seasons of his 10 MLB seasons.
Contreras is expected to be a reliable bat in the heart of Boston's lineup.
(AP Photo/Jeff Roberson) The Boston Red Sox have reportedly added some pop to their lineup.

title: 13 takeaways from Patriots’ comeback win over Ravens
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots clinched their first playoff berth since the 2021 season.
Drake Maye threw for over 300 yards for the first time in his career.

title: NH man pleads guilty to unlawfully delivering firearm to car theft suspect
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The New Hampshire man purchased a semi-automatic pistol for a co-conspirator who was ineligible for a gun license.
The man pleaded guilty to delivering this 9-millimeter Glock 19X semi-automatic pistol to a co-conspirator.

title: Former state Sen. Dean Tran pleads guilty to obstruction of justice, making false statements
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The former state senator is currently serving an 18-month sentence in federal prison for a series of previous convictions.
Former state senator Dean Tran pleaded guilty Friday to obstructing justice and making false statements.
Rick Cinclair/Worcester Telegram & Gazette By Darin Zullo December 21, 2025 | 10:45 AM 2 minutes to read Former State Sen.

title: Driver who allegedly ran from fatal crash in Stoughton charged with motor vehicle homicide
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The fatal crash occurred after a police pursuit of a pickup truck driver that began in Brockton and carried into Stoughton.

title: On IG, Padma Lakshmi gives a rave review to Boston Indian-fusion restaurant
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Food Lakshmi was in town for an MFA appearance when locals tipped her off to the restaurant.
Padma Lakshmi.

title: Did Bruins make wrong call starting Jeremy Swayman for 4th-straight game?

bullets: Boston Bruins “It was a big game for us, and we thought he would give us the best chance.
